amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 513 which exempted contracts under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program from the cost accounting standards promulgated under section 26 of the Office of Federal Procurement Policy Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the section that exempts health insurance companies that have contracts with the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program from complying with the cost accounting standards that apply to other federal contracts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
